item.description:
Dance to a Live Band! "REMINISCE”

REMINISCE is an oldies group specializing in songs primarily from the 50’s and early 60's. The group performs both acappella and with music accompaniment. REMINISCE combines acappella, instrumentation, showmanship and charisma to please a wide variety of audiences. REMINISCE prides itself on achieving the original record sound.  http://www.reminisceontheweb.com/TheGroup.html Watch Watch Reminisce on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XDxGl_KnaHU&feature=related

Social Swing Dancing is a great way to connect with new people...

“Want to mingle, get into shape and have a blast and meet cool people and learn to Swing Dance. Come with or with-out a partner Dance2Swing attracts singles and couples from all over New England and everyone dances with everyone.”

Swingin Sundays ~ There's a Group Swing Dance Lesson each week before the dance begins so beginners can learn the simple steps and get to know everyone and then dance all night to terrific Live Bands

Leominster Elks, 134 North Main St. Leominster MA 01453

6:30pm ~ Beginner Swing Dance Lesson

7:30pm ~ Swing Dance to Live Bands

Admission ~ $12 at the door

Cash Bar Available

Directions Leominster Lodge of Elks 134 North Main Street, (Route 12), Leominster, MA From Route 2, either West or East, take Exit 31A. That will put you on North Main Street which is Route 12 going South. Go through 2 sets of lights. After the 2nd set of lights you'll see The Leominster Hospital on your right. Stay to the left at the fork of the road. You'll come to your 3rd set of lights, go through the light staying on Route 12 South. The Elks will be on your right hand side. It's a white building, set off the road. From 495 N or S, Take Exit 29B to Route 2 West and follow directions above. From Worcester: I-190 North and merge onto Route 2 West. Follow directions above.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dance2Swing/Dance & Lessons- Live Band "Reminisce"
